meanings.sent1: The old trash bag was maggoty and smelled terrible.
meanings.sent2: The rotten apple was so maggoty that it was crawling with insects.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was ruined when they discovered the sandwiches were maggoty!
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had a maggoty appearance, with insects crawling in every corner.
meanings.sent5: The maggoty meat in the fridge made everyone lose their appetite.

meanings.sent1: The squirming mass of noodles looked maggoty and unappetizing.
meanings.sent2: The strange plant had a maggoty texture that made it hard to touch.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved pulling a maggoty rabbit out of a hat!
meanings.sent4: The dark alley had a maggoty feel, making it seem eerie and unsettling.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned ship had a maggoty appearance, with rust and decay everywhere.
